title: Add --from flag to tk note command
description:
Extend the 'note' command to support --from flag

Usage: tk note <id> "message" --from agent|human

Current behavior: Notes are added with timestamp but no author attribution

New behavior:
- Default: --from agent (maintains current behavior)
- --from human: Adds note with human attribution marker
- Attribution helps agent distinguish feedback from its own notes

Note format options:
Option A: Prefix in note text
  "2025-01-14 10:30 [human] - Use Stripe for payments"

Option B: Separate metadata (more complex)
  Store notes as structured data with author field

Recommendation: Option A (prefix) is simpler and grep-friendly

Implementation:
- Add --from flag to note FlagSet
- Validate value is "agent" or "human"
- Include prefix in timestamp line when --from human
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] --from flag added to note command
- [ ] Default is --from agent (no change to output)
- [ ] --from human adds attribution marker to note
- [ ] Invalid --from values rejected
- [ ] Help text documents the flag
